Inferno was hit but managed to stay inthe sky. The energy drats had
burned his metal skin badly but it managed to prevent them from
passing through to his interior. He shook his head then flew at Vlad
fireing his flamethrower.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Seeing two bots already en route to where the pod had crashed, Vlad 
> looked around for the one he had dubbed Drake.
> 
> Vlad: Drake! Get to that thing now and secure it or prevent those 
> stravags to get it!
> 
> He glanced and saw Inferno rising over the battlefield. Moving to 
> avoid being fired on, he shot a salvo of pulse laser fire, efectively 
> saturating the area with energy darts.
> 
> Tyrael took a brief note of Vlad's actions. He would look back at it 
> later. Meanwhile, he easily flew above Skulletron's missile and 
> countered with a massive volley of countless needle-sized light bolts 
> and two light shards he plucked from his feathered back.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > Inferno was hit by Vlad's missles knocked against some rocks. He
> > quickly recollected himself and fired up his thrusters launching
> > himself into the  air "Fell the power of the colony! EYYAH!" Inferno
> > exclaimed launching a few energy blasts at Vlad.
> > 
> > Quickstrike glanced at the stasis pod "The boss might reward me if I
> > get that for 'em" he said. He transformed to beast mode to avoid the
> > scanners and started to sneak towards the stasis pod.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > ???::
> > > 
> > > The femme jumped in order to reach the Triped's chip, but a serie 
> of 
> > > shot didn't let her went towarts the pod, she retreated towards 
> > > Vlad's and Tylrael's sied and opened fira gainst Predacons.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Eric Bischoff" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > > > : : Skulletron : :
> > > > 
> > > > Skulletron is prepared for attack from all angles this time.  He 
> > > strafes sideways and then rolls, avoiding Tyrael's attacks as well 
> as 
> > > some more base defence fire.  He again rolls to the side, firing a 
> > > missile at Tyrael.  However, due to the side roll, the shot's 
> > > accuracy was low.
